<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit&#160;10.47
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TRANSITION SUPPLY
<BR>
	AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	This Transition Supply Agreement (this &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8221;) is dated as of May&#160;30, 2014 (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Effective Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8221;), by and between
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	GENZYME CORPORATION
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, a Massachusetts corporation (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	GENZYME
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8221;), and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	AASTROM BIOSCIENCES,&#160;INC.,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a Michigan corporation (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	AASTROM
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8221;).&#160; Genzyme and Aastrom are referred to in this Agreement each as a &#8220;Party&#8221; and collectively as the &#8220;Parties.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	PREAMBLE AND BACKGROUND
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sanofi, a French Soci&#233;t&#233; Anonyme (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Sanofi
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8221;), as the seller, and AASTROM, as the buyer, have entered into an Asset Purchase Agreement on April&#160;19, 2014 (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	APA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8221;), whereby AASTROM has purchased from Sanofi substantially all of the assets constituting the Business (as such term is defined in the APA) under the terms and conditions set forth in the APA; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Pursuant to the APA, the Sanofi and AASTROM have agreed to enter into a certain number of transitional agreements, including this Agreement, whereby Sanofi, either directly, through one of its Affiliates, or through a third party shall provide to AASTROM, for a limited period of time from the Closing Date (as such term is defined in the APA), certain raw materials necessary for the Business as such raw materials that are listed in Exhibit&#160;1 (hereafter, such raw materials manufactured by GENZYME, the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Genzyme Raw Materials
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8221;, such raw materials manufactured by third parties, the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Third Party Raw Materials
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8221; and, collectively, the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Raw Materials
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8221;).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Capitalized terms used and not otherwise defined herein shall have the meanings set forth in the APA.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Now, therefore, for good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which is hereby acknowledged, the Parties agree as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	ARTICLE&#160; 1 - SCOPE OF THE AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	For the duration of the Agreement, GENZYME undertakes to supply AASTROM with the Raw Materials as so requested by AASTROM and AASTROM undertakes to purchase from GENZYME its requirements of Raw Materials as determined in AASTROM&#8217;S sole discretion, subject to the terms and conditions herein set forth.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	ARTICLE&#160; 2 - SUPPLY
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Genzyme Raw Materials delivered hereunder shall be manufactured in accordance with the applicable current Guidelines of Good Manufacturing Practices for Drugs (&#8220;cGMP&#8221;) and other applicable health authority regulations for therapeutic products as applicable to the Genzyme
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage174"></A>
<A NAME="EX1047TRANSITIONSUPPLYASAM_HTM_S5B8AA86F869E4341D8A76C13ADF00FB3">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Raw Materials.&#160; At the time of delivery to AASTROM by Genzyme, the Genzyme Raw Materials shall have a shelf life of at least the time period specified for such Raw Material on Exhibit&#160;1.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	ARTICLE&#160; 3 - FORECASTS - ORDERS
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Forecasts
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In order to enable GENZYME to regularly supply AASTROM with Raw Materials, AASTROM shall, before the fifth (5th) day of each month, provide GENZYME with a rolling forecast of its needs of Raw Materials for the following six (6)&#160;months, or until the end of the Term (defined below), broken down by calendar month. The first three (3)&#160;months of the forecast shall be binding.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Orders of Genzyme Raw Materials
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	AASTROM will order Genzyme Raw Materials directly from GENZYME. AASTROM will order such quantities of Genzyme Raw Materials to be supplied by GENZYME no less than three (3)&#160;months before the delivery date specified by AASTROM if such quantities are included in the rolling forecast.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Orders of Third Party Raw Materials
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	To the extent permitted under GENZYME&#8217;s agreements with the third party manufacturers, AASTROM will order Third Party Raw Materials directly from such third party, with such orders to be delivered to the GENZYME warehouse facility.&#160; Upon delivery, GENZYME will record the receipt of such orders via the MFGPro platform.&#160; Upon recording the receipt of such orders, AASTROM will have forty-five (45) business days to inspect the Third Party Raw Materials, pursuant to Section&#160;5.2.1.&#160; Unless the Third Party Raw Materials are rejected pursuant to Secion 5.2.1, GENZYME will warehouse the Third Party Raw Materials and will fill AASTROM&#8217;s orders of Third Party Raw Materials upon request for delivery, pursuant to Section&#160;3.4.&#160; Upon delivery of the Third Party Raw Materials to AASTROM, AASTROM will perform a further inspection of the Third Party Raw Materials pursuant to Section&#160;5.2.2. Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in this Agreement, nothing contained in this Agreement shall require GENZYME to take any actions that would reasonably be expected to result in a breach of any of its existing third party agreements.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	General Provisions
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	GENZYME will supply the quantities ordered by AASTROM for a given calendar month, provided that such orders do not exceed the forecast quantities for such calendar month, in which case GENZYME will use commercially reasonable efforts to meet AASTROM&#8217;s needs within a practical time. Notwithstanding the foregoing, it is understood that GENZYME shall not be obliged to deliver any quantities of Raw Materials in excess of the forecast quantities.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Under no circumstances shall GENZYME be obliged to accept any orders in quantities smaller than the minimum order size as reflected in Exhibit&#160;1, or to deliver Raw Materials pursuant to such orders that are smaller than the minimum order size as reflected in Exhibit&#160;1.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage175"></A>
<A NAME="EX1047TRANSITIONSUPPLYASAM_HTM_S5B8AA86F869E4341D8A76C13ADF00FB3">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Within fifteen (15) working days of receipt of AASTROM&#8217;s orders of Genzyme Raw Materials pursuant to Section&#160;3.2, or AASTROM&#8217;s requests for delivery of Third Party Raw Materials pursuant to Section&#160;3.3, GENZYME will acknowledge receipt of each order and either accept such order by confirming that it will deliver the order on the delivery date requested by AASTROM or propose another reasonable delivery date to AASTROM.&#160; If AASTROM confirms that such revised delivery date is acceptable to it within five (5)&#160;working days of GENZYME&#8217;s proposal, such order will be deemed accepted for such confirmed delivery date.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If GENZYME is unable to supply Raw Materials to AASTROM in accordance with the quantity or the delivery date specified in any accepted order, GENZYME shall inform AASTROM immediately and the Parties shall agree on an appropriate delivery date and/or other appropriate measures.&#160; In the event AASTROM obtains Raw Materials from another source due to a delay exceeding three (3)&#160;months, then any raw materials obtained will reduce the binding portion of the forecast accordingly.&#160; To the extent such delay is caused exclusively by GENZYME, GENZYME&#160; will reimburse AASTROM for all fully documented direct costs and expenses incurred byAASTROM in manufacturing or purchasing replacement Raw Materials that were subject to the purchase order.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	ARTICLE&#160; 4 - STORAGE
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	GENZYME shall maintain all stocks of Raw Materials in accordance with cGMP until delivery of such Raw Materials to AASTROM in accordance with this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	ARTICLE&#160; 5 - QUALITY &#8212; CONTROL
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Genzyme Raw Materials
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.1.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Genzyme Raw Materials delivered by GENZYME hereunder shall be in conformance with the specifications, as specified in Exhibit&#160;1 (hereinafter referred to as the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SPECIFICATIONS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8221;) at the time of delivery. Each delivery of Genzyme Raw Materials by GENZYME shall be accompanied by a certificate of analysis issued by GENZYME showing the conformity of the delivered batch of Genzyme Raw Materials with the SPECIFICATIONS. Such certificate of analysis shall conform with and be signed in accordance with cGMP and the other applicable regulatory requirements.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.1.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	AASTROM or its designee shall immediately, upon a shipment&#8217;s arrival on its site, carefully inspect such shipment of Genzyme Raw Materials for transport damages, losses and shortfalls. AASTROM shall notify the carrier of any apparent defects, including damaged containers or missing packages of Genzyme Raw Materials, within ten business days of arrival of the shipment and the freight documents at AASTROM or its designee&#8217;s site and, where possible, obtain the countersignature of the carrier&#8217;s representative. Failure of AASTROM or its designee to notify the carrier of such apparent defects within such period shall excuse GENZYME from any liability with respect to such defects.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.1.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	AASTROM undertakes to check GENZYME&#8217;s certificates of analysis for the Genzyme Raw Materials against the SPECIFICATIONS and will test any shipment of Genzyme Raw Materials for identity and compliance with the SPECIFICATIONS.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage176"></A>
<A NAME="EX1047TRANSITIONSUPPLYASAM_HTM_S5B8AA86F869E4341D8A76C13ADF00FB3">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In the event that any shipment of Genzyme Raw Materials fails to conform with the SPECIFICATIONS, AASTROM shall notify GENZYME thereof within forty-five (45) days of the delivery of Genzyme Raw Materials to AASTROM.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If so requested by GENZYME, AASTROM shall send to GENZYME a sample of the rejected shipment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	At GENZYME&#8217;s discretion, the batches of Genzyme Raw Materials which do not conform with the SPECIFICATIONS shall either be returned to GENZYME, with freight and insurance charges to be borne by GENZYME, or destroyed by AASTROM, at GENZYME&#8217;s expense. In such latter case, AASTROM shall give GENZYME evidence of such destruction.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	GENZYME&#8217;s sole obligation and AASTROM&#8217;s sole and exclusive remedy with respect to such non-conforming Genzyme Raw Materials shall be for GENZYME to replace such Genzyme Raw Materials at no charge to AASTROM as soon as reasonably possible.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.1.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Failure of AASTROM to mail notice of rejection within thirty (30) days of the delivery of Genzyme Raw Materials to AASTROM or its designee, as applicable, shall constitute an irrevocable acceptance of such Raw Materials.&#160; Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Agreement, if defect in the Genzyme Raw Materials could not reasonably be discovered within such thirty (30) day period outlined above (a &#8220;Latent Defect&#8221;), then AASTROM shall have the right to reject such Genzyme Raw Materials within five (5)&#160;calendar days after discovering such Latent Defect, but in any event no later than the shorter of (i)&#160;two (2)&#160;months from the delivery date of such Genzyme Raw Materials, or (ii)&#160;the shelf life of such Genzyme Raw Materials as listed on Exhibit&#160;1.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Any dispute between the Parties regarding the conformity or non-conformity of the Genzyme Raw Materials to the SPECIFICATIONS shall be submitted to an independent laboratory, to be agreed upon by the Parties.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Should the Parties fail to agree on the designation of the independent laboratory within thirty (30) working days of the date that such dispute arises, either Party may seek redress in a court of competent jurisdiction in accordance with the provisions of Article&#160;13.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The decision of such independent laboratory shall be binding on both parties.&#160; Any costs or expenses incurred in connection with the dispute resolution by such independent laboratory shall be borne by the non-prevailing Party.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.1.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	GENZYME makes no warranty of any kind, express or implied, except that the Genzyme Raw Materials sold to AASTROM shall have been manufactured in accordance with Article&#160;2 and shall, upon delivery to AASTROM, conform to the SPECIFICATIONS.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Third Party Raw Materials
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.2.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In accordance with Section&#160;3.3, upon arrival of a delivery of Third Party Raw Materials at the GENZYME warehouse facility, AASTROM shall be responsible for
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

<A NAME="eolPage177"></A>
<A NAME="EX1047TRANSITIONSUPPLYASAM_HTM_S5B8AA86F869E4341D8A76C13ADF00FB3">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	inspection of such Third Party Raw Materials, including checking any third party manufacturer certificates of analysis against the relevant third party manufacturer specifications or testing any shipment of Third Party Raw Materials for identity and compliance with such specifications. To the extent the Third Party Raw Materials do not conform with the relevant third party manufacturer specifications, the Parties shall cooperate to cause such non-conforming Third Party Materials to be returned to the third party manufacturer according to the procedures prescribed by the underlying agreements with such third party manufacturer.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	GENZYME&#8217;s sole obligation and AASTROM&#8217;s sole and exclusive remedy with respect to such non-conforming Third Party Raw Materials shall be for GENZYME to cooperate with AASTROM to seek replacement pursuant to the underlying agreements with such third party manufacturers.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.2.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Upon final delivery of Third Party Raw Materials from the GENZYME warehouse facility to AASTROM in accordance with Section&#160;3.3, AASTROM or its designee shall immediately inspect such shipment of Third Party Raw Materials for transport damages, losses and shortfalls. AASTROM shall notify the carrier of any apparent defects, including damaged containers or missing packages of Third Party Raw Materials (but excluding defects governed by Section&#160;5.2.1), within ten business days of arrival of the shipment and the freight documents at AASTROM or its designee&#8217;s site and, where possible, obtain the countersignature of the carrier&#8217;s representative. Failure of AASTROM or its designee to notify the carrier of such apparent defects within such period shall excuse GENZYME from any liability with respect to such defects.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	GENZYME&#8217;s sole obligation and AASTROM&#8217;s sole and exclusive remedy with respect to such defective Third Party Raw Materials, where said defects were caused by GENZYME, shall be for GENZYME to replace such Third Party Raw Materials at no charge to AASTROM.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.2.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	All Third Party Raw Materials supplied by GENZYME to AASTROM pursuant to this Agreement are provided on an &#8220;as-is&#8221; basis at the sole risk of AASTROM, and GENZYME makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to any Third Party Raw Materials.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, Genzyme will make commercially reasonable efforts to ensure that any express or implied warranties running from any third party manufacturer of Third Party Raw Materials to GENZYME shall also run to the benefit of AASTROM, and such warranties, if any, shall be the sole warranties arising from the supply by GENZYME of Third Party Raw Materials to AASTROM under this Agreement..
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	General Provisions
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH IN THIS SECTION&#160;5.5, GENZYME MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, WITH RESPECT TO THE RAW MATERIALS OR ANY PHARMACEUTICAL PRODUCTS PRODUCED FROM OR CONTAINING THE RAW MATERIALS AND EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ALL IMPLIED WARRANTIES,&#160;INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION ANY WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE OR OF NON-INFRINGEMENT.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>

</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	ARTICLE&#160; 6 - REGULATORY
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	GENZYME shall diligently, at its cost, compile, submit and, at all times during the term of this Agreement, maintain all regulatory filings for the Genzyme Raw Materials in accordance with the standards required by the applicable regulatory authority in the United States.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-36PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	GENZYME shall, at its cost, maintain all governmental, regulatory and other licences, consents, approvals and authorisations necessary to ensure the supply, without break in continuity, of Genzyme Raw Materials to AASTROM during the term of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	GENZYME shall provide access at all times to applicable regulatory authorities and co-operate fully with such authorities with respect to any matter involving the Genzyme Raw Materials supplied to AASTROM, or with respect to the warehousing and storage of the Third Party Raw Materials supplied to AASTROM.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	AASTROM will be allowed, at any time during the term of the Agreement, to carry out reasonable quality assurance audits of the premises and facilities where the Genzyme Raw Materials are manufactured by GENZYME or any of its Affiliates and to inspect any documentation relating to the quality of the Genzyme Raw Materials, during working hours and with reasonable prior notice to GENZYME.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Where any audit or inspection by the regulatory authorities or representatives of AASTROM&#160; identifies any issues that may affect the quality of the Genzyme Raw Materials, such as non-compliance with the applicable cGMP or other legal or regulatory requirements, such issues shall be resolved in accordance with the governance and dispute resolution provisions of Article&#160;3 of the Transition Services Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	GENZYME shall retain all manufacturing records relating to Genzyme Raw Materials purchased by AASTROM, and retention samples of all Genzyme Raw Materials purchased by AASTROM, for a period of not less than six (6)&#160;years.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	GENZYME shall retain exclusive responsibility for all decisions and actions with respect to any complaint, recall, market withdrawal or other corrective action with respect to any products created from or incorporating the Raw Materials until the transfer to AASTROM of the licenses with respect to such products, at which point all such responsibility will transfer to AASTROM.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	ARTICLE&#160; 7 - PRICES - TERMS OF PAYMENT AND DELIVERY
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The purchase price for Raw Materials shall be: (i)&#160;with respect to Third Party Raw Materials, GENZYME&#8217;s cost of procuring the Third Party Raw Materials plus five percent (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Third Party Payment Amount
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8221;), and (ii)&#160;with respect to Genzyme Raw Materials, GENZYME&#8217;s cost of producing the Genzyme Raw Materials as set forth on Exhibit&#160;1 plus five percent (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Genzyme Payment Amount
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8221;).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Title to a given shipment of Raw Materials shall pass to AASTROM upon full payment of the Third Party Payment Amount or the Genzyme Payment Amount, as applicable, for such shipment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>

<A NAME="EX1047TRANSITIONSUPPLYASAM_HTM_S5B8AA86F869E4341D8A76C13ADF00FB3">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Notwithstanding the retention of title, transfer of risk with respect to a given shipment of the Raw Materials shall occur upon delivery of such shipment to AASTROM or its designee&#8217;s site.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	GENZYME shall invoice AASTROM upon delivery of the Raw Materials. Payment shall be due and payable by bank transfer in USD (US Dollars) within thirty (30) days from the date of invoice.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In the absence of the express written consent of GENZYME, failure to pay all or any part of an invoice when due will, without notice and without prejudice to other remedies, automatically give rise to interest for late payment (which may be increased by VAT) which rate shall be equal to the lesser of twelve percent (12%) per annum or the maximum rate allowed by applicable law. Interest shall accrue starting from the initial payment due date until the date of full payment of the applicable invoice.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	ARTICLE&#160; 8 - LIABILITY - INSURANCE - INDEMNITY
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	AASTROM shall assume, upon delivery of any shipment of Raw Materials according to Section&#160;7.1, all risks and liabilities resulting from the storage or any subsequent uses of such shipment of Raw Materials, including in combination with other components, provided that, with respect to Genzyme Raw Materials, at the time of delivery such Genzyme Raw Materials are in compliance with the SPECIFICATIONS and otherwise in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement.&#160; GENZYME shall not be responsible for non-conforming Third Party Raw Materials, unless such Third Party Raw Materials are damaged while in GENZYME&#8217;s possession.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:38PX;TEXT-INDENT:-39PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LEGAL REQUIREMENTS, AND EXCEPT FOR CLAIMS PURSUANT TO SECTIONS 8.5, 8.6 AND 8.7 AND IN CIRCUMSTANCES WHERE AWARDED TO A THIRD PARTY, (A)&#160;NEITHER PARTY WILL BE LIABLE TO THE OTHER FOR ANY LOST PROFITS OR OTHER SPECIAL,&#160;INCIDENTAL,&#160;INDIRECT, PUNITIVE OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES, HOWEVER CAUSED, UNDER ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, ARISING FROM THE PERFORMANCE OF, OR RELATING TO, THIS AGREEMENT REGARDLESS OF WHETHER SUCH PARTY HAS BEEN NOTIFIED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF, OR THE FORESEEABILITY OF, SUCH DAMAGES; AND (B)&#160;EACH PARTY&#8217;S LIABILITY FOR DAMAGES IN CONNECTION WITH THIS AGREEMENT OR THE PERFORMANCE OR NEGOTIATION HEREOF WILL NOT EXCEED THE AMOUNT OF THE INVOICE FOR THE SHIPMENT OF RAW MATERIALS WITH RESPECT TO WHICH SUCH LOSSES, DAMAGES, LIABILITIES OR EXPENSES AROSE.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Each Party shall take all necessary steps, at its own cost and its own behalf to properly insure, with a reputable insurance company as far as reasonably possible, its entire legal liability resulting from its activity performed pursuant to this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Each Party shall promptly inform the other Party of any significant claims or threatened claims in connection with the Raw Materials and shall consult with the other Party with respect to such claims or threatened claims.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	AASTROM will indemnify, defend and hold harmless GENZYME and its officers, directors, agents, employees and Affiliates, from and against any and all Damages,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage180"></A>
<A NAME="EX1047TRANSITIONSUPPLYASAM_HTM_S5B8AA86F869E4341D8A76C13ADF00FB3">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	including reasonable attorneys&#8217; fees (collectively, &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Losses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8221;) arising out of, relating to or resulting from (a)&#160;AASTROM&#8217;s material breach of this Agreement, (b)&#160;AASTROM&#8217;s gross negligence or willful misconduct in connection with its receipt of Raw Materials pursuant to this Agreement or (c)&#160;AASTROM&#8217;s use or GENZYME&#8217;s provision of Raw Materials supplied pursuant to this Agreement, except for those Losses for which GENZYME is obligated to indemnify, defend and hold harmless Service Recipient and its officers, directors, agents, employees and Affiliates pursuant to Section&#160;8.6.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	GENZYME will indemnify, defend and hold harmless AASTROM and its officers, directors, agents, employees and Affiliates from and against any and all Losses arising out of, relating to or resulting from (a)&#160;GENZYME&#8217;s material breach of this Agreement or (b)&#160;GENZYME&#8217;s gross negligence or willful misconduct in the provision of Genzyme Raw Materials pursuant to this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	An indemnifying Party&#8217;s indemnification obligations hereunder will be conditioned upon (a)&#160;the indemnified Party providing the indemnifying Party with written notice describing such indemnification claim (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Claim
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8221;) in reasonable detail in light of the circumstances then known and then providing the indemnifying Party with further notices to keep it reasonably informed with respect thereto; provided however, that failure of the indemnified Party to provide such notice or keep the indemnifying Party reasonably informed as provided herein will not relieve the indemnifying Party of its obligations hereunder except to the extent, if any, that the indemnified Party is materially prejudiced thereby, (b)&#160;the indemnifying Party being entitled to participate in such Claim and assume the defense thereof with counsel reasonably satisfactory to the indemnified Party, at the indemnifying Party&#8217;s sole expense, and (c)&#160;the indemnified Party reasonably cooperating with the indemnifying Party, at the indemnifying Party&#8217;s sole cost and expense, in the defense of any Claim. The indemnifying Party will not accept any settlement that places restrictions on any indemnified Party or requires any payment by any indemnified Party and, further, will not accept any settlement unless the settlement includes as an unconditional term thereof the giving by the claimant or the plaintiff of a full and unconditional release of the indemnified Parties, from all liability with respect to the matters that are subject to such Claim, without the indemnified Party&#8217;s prior written consent, which consent will not be unreasonably withheld, delayed or conditioned. The indemnified Party may participate in the defense of any claim with counsel reasonably acceptable to the indemnifying Party, at the indemnified Party&#8217;s own expense.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	With the exception of any claims of fraud which are proven and upon which a judgment entered in the involved proceeding will be expressly based, the Parties acknowledge and agree that the provisions of Sections 8.5, 8.6 and 8.7 will be the exclusive remedy for all claims relating to this Agreement, including the negotiation or performance hereof.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	ARTICLE&#160; 9 &#8212; CONFIDENTIALITY AND INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	9.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Parties may from time to time disclose to each other Confidential Information (as defined in the APA).&#160; For avoidance of doubt, the Specifications and batch records, orders and purchasing terms of Aastrom shall be deemed the Confidential Information of Aastrom. Each Party and its Affiliates, shall not disclose such information to third Persons and shall not use such information for purposes other than the purposes expressly set forth in this Agreement, without the prior written consent of the other
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage181"></A>
<A NAME="EX1047TRANSITIONSUPPLYASAM_HTM_S5B8AA86F869E4341D8A76C13ADF00FB3">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Party. Each Party may disclose such information on a strict need-to-know basis only to Persons directly engaged with such Party&#8217;s activities under this Agreement (including any Party&#8217;s Affiliates and their employees), and shall ensure that such Persons are bound by confidentiality obligations equivalent to those set forth in this Agreement. The obligation of confidentiality set forth in this Section&#160;9.1 shall apply during the term of the Agreement and ten (10)&#160;years after its termination or expiration.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:36PX;TEXT-INDENT:-36PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	9.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The foregoing obligations shall not apply, however, to any part of such information received, which:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:36PX;TEXT-INDENT:-36PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:100PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:76PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	can be shown by written documentation to have been known to the receiving Party and/or any of its Affiliates prior to disclosure by the disclosing Party, other than such Confidential Information in the possession of Sanofi, GENZYME and their respective Affiliates due to its previous ownership of the Business and/or the Transferred Assets; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:100PX;TEXT-INDENT:-24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:100PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:76PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	b.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	was known to the public or generally available to the public prior to the date of the disclosure to the receiving Party by the disclosing Party; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:100PX;TEXT-INDENT:-24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:100PX;TEXT-INDENT:-24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	c.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	enters the public domain by publication or otherwise through no breach of this Agreement; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:100PX;TEXT-INDENT:-24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:100PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-LEFT:76PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	d.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	can be shown by written documentation to have been made known to the receiving Party and/or any of its Affiliates without breach of any obligation of confidentiality by a third party having the bona fide right to disclose or make available such information.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:100PX;TEXT-INDENT:-24PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:36PX;TEXT-INDENT:-36PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	9.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Each Party may disclose the confidential information if such disclosure is required by applicable law, regulation or legal process, provided that prior notification of such disclosure is given to to the other Party. In such case, the receiving Party shall promptly notify the other Party in writing and, upon such Party&#8217;s request (and at the disclosing Party&#8217;s cost), the receiving Party will reasonably cooperate with the other Party in taking all lawful action (at such other Party&#8217;s cost) against such compelled disclosure or necessary to comply with such compelled disclosure, as applicable, provided always that any disclosure shall be only to the extent required.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:36PX;TEXT-INDENT:-36PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-36PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	9.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:3PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If GENZYME becomes aware of any infringement of AASTROM&#8217;s intellectual or industrial property rights related to the Raw Materials by third parties, GENZYME shall immediately notify AASTROM thereof in writing. If reasonably requested by AASTROM, GENZYME will assist or join AASTROM, at AASTROM&#8217;s expense, in taking such steps as AASTROM and/or its counsel may deem advisable for the protection of AASTROM&#8217;s rights. The commencement, strategies, termination and settlement of any action relating to the validity or infringement of such property rights shall be decided by AASTROM in its sole discretion. Any such proceedings shall be at the expense of AASTROM and any recoveries shall be for the benefit of AASTROM. Nothing herein, however, shall be deemed to require AASTROM to enforce its property rights against others or to allow AASTROM or require GENZYME to compromise or prejudice any intellectual or industrial property rights belonging to GENZYME or licensed to GENZYME by any third party.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:37PX;TEXT-INDENT:-38PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
</DIV>
